attributes.action: Include a facility on the petition site to register opposition to each petition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A fair assessment of the public's opinion on any topic can only be obtained by counting not just the number of people supporting a petition, but also the number opposing it. Allow visitors to sign their name against a petition as either FOR or AGAINST the proposals within it.

While you are at it, a third option for THIS IS TRIVIAL will tell you when an issue is only of concern to those directly involved.

rejection.details: This has been dealt with in our faqs: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/faq
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
